Comment: I think one of the biggest fears is the way they are trying to bypass due process of the law. It's the last bastion of a free and democratic society. Once it's gone anyone could end up in a prison in El Salvador and America becomes an authoritarian regime.   I realize this country is heavily divided right now but regardless of how you feel, freedom should never be something you willingly give away.
